entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 09:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
